channel.title: A easy question ;How to make a item twohanded?
channel.description:
Hello i want to no how do i make items two handed.. I no its a nooby question but i forgot -.-
So please tell me how to make a iitem twohanded
Help is appreciated Thanks
Im usin delta source

item.title: A easy question ;How to make a item twohanded?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Kalvin:

For e.g Dragon claws on my server are 1 handed you can wield with a shield and i want to no how can i make it so it takes the shield slot too…

     if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == *** && playerEquipment[playerShield] > 0) {
          remove(playerEquipment[playerShield], playerShield);
          sM("You cannot wield a shield with this weapon.");
     }

Basic framework I guess.
